data.title: Smithsonian Plasma Ball
data.meta_description: Shop Smithsonian Plasma Ball at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text:
BoyMom77 Great science toy! - Great gift for my science loving boys! It’s not too big so it doesn’t eat up the limited surface space on my son’s dresser, it responds really well to either touch or sound and so far hasn’t chewed through batteries in spite of how much activity it’s received! Well done!

With the Smithsonian Plasma Ball, you can enjoy an incredible atomic light show right at your fingertips. Just turn it on and watch what happens when atoms collide with each other and energized electrons. Watch your fingertips create amazing light effects as you observe how colliding atoms release energy in the form of light waves. Recommended for ages 14+, the plasma ball also responds to sound and music and comes packaged with STEM educational content. Requires 6 AA (1.5V) batteries (not included).
